description._content: Description: Henrietta Szold at home, Jerusalem Creator/Photographer: Unknown Medium: Black and white photographic print Dimensions: 8 x 13 centimeters Date: circa 1922 Persistent URL: digital.cjh.org/R/?func=dbin-jump-full&object_id=246239 Call Number: Record Group 18, Box 1 Folder 7 Repository: Hadassah Archives, housed at the American Jewish Historical Society, 15 West 16th Street, New York, NY 10011 Rights Information: No known copyright restrictions; may be subject to third party rights.
